nodes.bodyText: is this test really serving the purpose as it will always be skipped without remote target set up on MinIO server? Other than that, PR looks good to me.
Yes. It is needed. That's how I tested the implementation. Do you think any better way to do in automated tests?

the MINIO_JAVA_TEST_REPLICATION_ROLE is validated on MinIO server while setting the replication configuration - since java SDK does not implement the admin API to get the arn while setting up remote targets, I do not see how this test will get executed

You would need to run these functional tests by exporting
$ export MINIO_JAVA_TEST_REPLICATION_SRC_BUCKET=<SRC-BUCKET>
$ export MINIO_JAVA_TEST_REPLICATION_ROLE=<REPLICATON-ROLE>
$ export MINIO_JAVA_TEST_REPLICATION_BUCKET_ARN=<REPLICATION-BUCKET-ARN>
$`./gradlew runFunctionalTest -Pendpoint=ENDPOINT -PaccessKey=ACCESSKEY -PsecretKey=SECRETKEY -Pregion=REGION`
Here you would need to have source/destination buckets and replication role created before running the test.
my comment was wr.t mint tests.
